head.title: Move {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} document in any order. Process PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and other formats.

header.title: Move pages in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} grants to {{EnvNameShort}} applications an ability to reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} Info
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile document processing tool that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images and archives. It provides essential features such as merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and removing pages.

more_features.title: Effective document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is developed to provide comprehensive set of features. You are able to process more than 50 widely used business file formats for your business needs.

feature_1.title: Combine documents in many formats
feature_1.content: Join content of such files like PDFs, Word, presentations, spreadsheets, images, archives, etc. Use flexible options to achieve exact what you need.

feature_2.title: Pages manipulations
feature_2.content: Change pages position in documents. Move, swipe, remove, pages in order to manage your business documents content.

feature_3.title: Manipulate with pages appearance
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or change their orientation between landscape and portrait.

feature_4.title: Extract pages to standalone files
feature_4.content: Get one or more pages and save them as a separate document.

formats.title: Reorder document pages in many formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, enabling efficient document manipulation.

operations.title: Main features
operations.description: Explore other popular capabilities of our solution.

examples.comment_2: Specify the page to be moved

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows you to move selected pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Give more abilities to your {{EnvName}} applications by using our advanced document processing features.
content.step_2: Set up page number and new position.

code_1.title: Move a page to the document end
code_1.content: Be informed how to move a specific page exactly to the end of {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Pass source file path to constructor
code_1.comment_2: Get document info and number of the last page
code_1.comment_4: Process the document moving the page to the end
code_1.comment_5: Save the document to a new location
